issue.title: Access to the thrust_angle topic and more

content.raw:
Matthieu,

There are a few items/issues you discuss, so I’ll try to pull them apart…

1. Installing from source.  If you follow the instructions here [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall)  
  Does `catkin_make` fail?  If so, could you post the output?  
2. I added a sentence to try and describe the purpose of the first set of tutorials: “Example Environments: These tutorials illustrate bringing up example environments within Gazebo as a starting point for development.”
3. For the sensor configuration, for the VRX competition the configuration is limited to 3 cameras.  That is a new feature so we’ll work on the consistency.  @{5b96b66385af94340e7cabce} could you take a look?
4. For the AddingSensors tutorial, if you add the snippet of xacro to the `my_wamv.urdf.xacro` file - you can add it just before the closing `</robot>` tag in the file. 

    1. Then when you call `rosrun xacro xacro --inorder my_wamv.urdf.xacro > my_wamv.urdf` it should generate the my\_wamv.urdf file.  
    2. One way to verify is to run `grep stereo_left *.*` which should generate results similar to this…  
    
        ![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/188903469-image.png)
    

We are actively working on the tutorials, so appreciate the debugging.
content.html:
Matthieu,

There are a few items/issues you discuss, so I’ll try to pull them apart…

  1. Installing from source. If you follow the instructions here #!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall
    Does catkin_make fail? If so, could you post the output?
  2. I added a sentence to try and describe the purpose of the first set of tutorials: “Example Environments: These tutorials illustrate bringing up example environments within Gazebo as a starting point for development.”
  3. For the sensor configuration, for the VRX competition the configuration is limited to 3 cameras. That is a new feature so we’ll work on the consistency. @Tyler Lum could you take a look?

  4. For the AddingSensors tutorial, if you add the snippet of xacro to the my_wamv.urdf.xacro file - you can add it just before the closing </robot> tag in the file.

    1. Then when you call rosrun xacro xacro --inorder my_wamv.urdf.xacro > my_wamv.urdf it should generate the my_wamv.urdf file.

    2. One way to verify is to run grep stereo_left *.* which should generate results similar to this…

We are actively working on the tutorials, so appreciate the debugging.
